name: Shmup (itch) (geg321)
description:
this is a 2D shooter with enemies that spawn from the top that you must stop from passing the bottom of the screen or else you will lose lives and once you run out of lives you will explode. The challenges that i faced during the project was understanding how to use collisions as triggers also how to set audio clips to play as well as making sprites.

Enemy sprites made by: Evie Cundy ec3938@nyu.edu
